name: Catness Overload
description:
Cats are invading your junkyard! 

Protect it with your heartless robot, but can it resist their cuteness?

Find out by shooting them in the face with totally harmless balls. 

Survive as long as you can, the integrity of this place depends on it!

  • Upgrade your robot:
    • Shoot faster
    • Shoot more balls
    • Add bounces to your projectiles
CONTROLS
  • Move : WASD
  • Look : Mouse
  • Shoot : Left Mouse
  • Upgrade : E
  • Laser on/off : F  
  • Pause : Escape
